stories.headline: FIRST VENTURE Finding racial tilt in arrests
stories.summary: An investigation into the racial composition of juvenile arrests in Columbia, revealing a disproportionate rate of arrest among black children despite them being a minority in the city.

stories.headline: PEACE CORPS Analysis exposes attacks on volunteers
stories.summary: Investigation revealing an increasing number of assaults on Peace Corps volunteers, with a focus on young women abroad, using federal data and individual case studies.

stories.headline: SPOTLIGHT: ELECTIONS Using CAR to cover the vote
stories.summary: Discusses the use of computer-assisted reporting techniques to enhance election coverage beyond traditional campaign finance stories.
